name: springboot-snyk-fix
description: MCP tool: fully automated multi-module Spring Boot workflow with IDE repo auto-detection, Snyk fix, regression, fail-safe, Maven builds, interactive PR buttons, retry, conflict detection, and automatic base branch update

run.description: Run complete workflow with auto-detected repo path, pre/post Maven builds, Snyk fix, regressions, fail-safe, interactive PR buttons, retry, conflict detection, and base branch update

repo_path.description: Path to local repo. Leave empty to auto-detect current IDE/project folder.

repo_url.description: Git repo URL (used if repo_path is empty and cloning is needed)

mode.description: Comma-separated modes: all, clone_build, snyk_test, snyk_fix, rebuild, pr

run: # Auto-detect repo path if not provided
echo "â„¹ï¸ Repo path not provided. Using current IDE/project directory: $REPO_DIR"
echo 'ðŸ”¹ Cloning repository...'; git clone {{repo_url}} $REPO_DIR || { echo 'âŒ Git clone failed'; exit 1; };
cd $REPO_DIR || { echo 'âŒ Cannot access repo'; exit 1; }
echo 'ðŸ”¹ Checking out base branch {{base_branch}}...'; git checkout {{base_branch}} || { echo 'âŒ Git checkout failed'; exit 1; }
for M in "${MODES[@]}"; do if [[ $M == 'snyk_fix' || $M == 'all' ]]; then RUN_PREPOST_BUILD=true; break; fi; done
echo 'ðŸ”¹ Running initial Maven build...'; mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven build failed'; exit 1; };
if [ "$RUN_PREPOST_BUILD" = true ]; then echo 'ðŸ”¹ Maven build before Snyk test'; mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven pre-test build failed'; exit 1; }; fi
echo 'ðŸ”¹ Running Snyk test...'; snyk test || { echo 'âš ï¸ Snyk test failed'; exit 1; };
echo 'ðŸ”¹ Maven build before Snyk fix'; mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven pre-fix build failed'; exit 1; }
if [ '{{fix_mode}}' = 'wizard' ]; then snyk wizard || { echo 'âŒ Snyk wizard failed'; exit 1; }; else snyk fix || { echo 'âŒ Snyk fix failed'; exit 1; }; fi
echo 'ðŸ”¹ Maven build after Snyk fix'; mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven post-fix build failed'; exit 1; };
mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven regression build failed'; exit 1; }
echo "âš ï¸ Vulnerabilities found in regression #$i, applying fix..."
if [ '{{fix_mode}}' = 'wizard' ]; then snyk wizard || { echo 'âŒ Snyk wizard failed'; exit 1; }; else snyk fix || { echo 'âŒ Snyk fix failed'; exit 1; }; fi
echo "âœ… No vulnerabilities detected in regression #$i"; break
echo 'ðŸ”¹ Final vulnerability check after regressions'
mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven build failed'; exit 1; }
echo 'âš ï¸ WARNING: Vulnerabilities still exist after 2 regression fixes!'
echo 'ðŸ’¡ Please review manually before creating a PR.'
echo 'âœ… All vulnerabilities fixed after regression iterations.'
# Interactive PR buttons with retry, conflict detection, and automatic base branch update
"prompt": "ðŸ’¡ Vulnerabilities fixed or reviewed. Do you want to create a PR?",
"  git commit -m '{{pr_title}}' || echo 'âš ï¸ Nothing to commit'",
"  # Automatic base branch update to reduce conflicts",
"  if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo 'âš ï¸ Merge conflicts detected with base branch. Please resolve manually.'; break; fi",
"  git commit -m 'Merged latest {{base_branch}} before PR' || true",
"  git push origin {{new_branch}} && gh pr create --title '{{pr_title}}' --body '{{pr_body}}' --base {{base_branch}} --head {{new_branch}} && success=true && break",
"  echo 'âš ï¸ Push/PR failed. Retry in $RETRY_DELAY seconds...'; sleep $RETRY_DELAY",
"if [ \"$success\" = false ]; then echo 'âŒ PR creation failed after $MAX_RETRIES attempts. Please resolve conflicts manually.'; fi"
rebuild) mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven rebuild failed'; exit 1; }; ;;
mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven build failed'; exit 1; }
snyk test || { echo 'âš ï¸ Snyk test failed'; exit 1; }
snyk fix || { echo 'âŒ Snyk fix failed'; exit 1; }
mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo 'âŒ Maven post-fix build failed'; exit 1; }
for i in 1 2; do mvn clean install -DskipTests; snyk test; done
echo 'âœ… Workflow completed. Use interactive buttons for PR creation if needed.'
echo 'âœ… Workflow completed for selected modes!'
